Row.Text: When a city is conquered, the followers of your State Religion from that city emigrate to your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital. Enemy cities with followers from your religion have reduced [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength.
Our people are now buying your isinglass and speculating on your Semitism. I worry the rest of the world will also succumb to the influence of your culture.
Consolidate the Khaganate

It was long ago that ours was a tribal kingdom. Today, we are an empire, and an empire demands a central leadership to control it.
